subject: JUnit Reports
msgSnippet: Hi, I am looking for a solution, where I can generate reports for my dynamically loaded (through java program) Test Cases. Actually, I have written a java
messageBody:
Hi,

I am looking for a solution, where I can generate reports for my
dynamically loaded (through java program) Test Cases. Actually, I
have written a java program that search for a particular directory
(say TESTS) for Test Cases, and dynamically load them at runtime.
Now, I am able to execute those Test Cases using JUnit Swing
interface, but I want to generate Reports for them. Can anyone tell
me, how it is possible?

I have seen the ANT facility to generate the JUnit reports, but for
that I need to write the names of the Test Cases in build.xml, which
doesn't solve my purpose. I want to use some java APIs to generate
those reports.

Please Help.

Sumit
